featured.text: And there are plenty of models from which to choose: from simple $200 point-and-shoot snappers to $1,000 wonders with all the features that any advanced amateur could want.
Couples danced to music provided by a local amateur band or a record player.

definition.zh_def: 業餘的；非專業的，通常指對某項活動或興趣的愛好者。
definition.en_def: A person who engages in a pursuit, especially a sport, on an unpaid basis; a non-professional.
definition.example: He is an amateur photographer who enjoys taking pictures in his free time.
